details.text: Global interconnect for 4 global loads and 6 global stores. Reduce number of global loads and stores to simplify global interconnect.
For 4 global loads and 6 global stores.

links.guide: Best Practices Guide : Global Memory Interconnect

details.text: This read-only memory contains information for the host about the system and about each kernel in the system, including kernel names, arguments, and attributes. The system description ROM ensures that the binary image on the FPGA is compatible with the host program.
1 register of width 32 bits and depth 4
Depth was increased by a factor of 40 due to a loop initiation interval of 40.
1 register of width 32 bits and depth 4
Depth was increased by a factor of 233 due to a loop initiation interval of 233.
1 register of width 32 bits and depth 4
Depth was increased by a factor of 40 due to a loop initiation interval of 40.

Additional information.text: Shallow memory implemented in RAMs instead of MLABs because MLABs cannot be configured in true dual-port mode.
RAM usage is increased from 64 RAMs to 128 RAMs because the width of individual RAM blocks in true dual-port mode is limited to 20 bits.
Requested size 3276 bytes, implemented size 4096 bytes, stallable, 80 reads and 17 writes.

details.text: Reduce the number of write accesses or fix banking to make this memory system stall-free. Banking may be improved by using compile-time known indexing on lowest array dimension.

Additional information.text: Banked on bits 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 into 64 separate banks.
Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.
RAM usage is increased from 16 RAMs to 32 RAMs because the width of individual RAM blocks in true dual-port mode is limited to 20 bits.
Requested size 3276 bytes, implemented size 4096 bytes, stall-free, 17 reads and 17 writes.
Banked on bits 2, 3, 4, 5 into 16 separate banks.
Reducing accesses to exactly one read and one write for all on-chip memory systems may increase overall system performance.
Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.
